headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Vehicle Discounts
content:
Through July 2nd, take 30% off a selection of battle and track-ready vehicles:

MAMMOTH AVENGER AND RENOVATIONS
MOBILE OPERATIONS CENTER CABS AND RENOVATIONS
VAPID GB200
GROTTI X80 PROTO
IMPONTE RUINER 2000

Check out the Rockstar Newswire for all the details.
